==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
Ancient simplification of {{och-l|䨮}}, which is in turn {{Han compound|⻗|彗|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc|nocap=1}}.

===Etymology===
Starostin compared this with {{cog|bo|སད||frost, cold air, cold, coldness}}. This may be unlikely considering the phonetic part of this character.
